RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUNCHATTHELIZARD was bumped at the start, set a pressured pace along the inside through the turn, edged clear in upper stretch and prevailed under brisk handling. TURBO POWER pressured the winner two wide and finished second best. AFLEET O ME hesitated at the start, saved ground into the turn, angled out nearing the top of the stretch and was steadily gaining ground late three wide. ORLEANS STORM allowed to settle, moved up along the inside into the stretch and finished with good courage in the two path. HAPPY TAKEOVER failed to menace. OXBOW'S RIDE broke outward bumping the winner, had speed through the turn then weakened weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet O Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, angled out turn, gaining 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Oxbow's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, speed turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lunchatthelizard
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pressured pace, held well, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Orleans Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished well 2path

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Takeover
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Turbo Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 29. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANTRUNWITHBIGDOGS was fractious in the gate prior to the start, upon being reloaded chased the leader into the stretch, rallied two wide under left handed urging to make the lead near the sixteenth pole and edged clear late under strong handling. CAN'T CRASHMYPARTY saved ground into the stretch, angled out to the five path at the furlong marker and rallied for second. NIKAO trailed into the stretch, steadied near the furlong marker and closed a gap late. COUNCIL OF FOUR failed to menace. BAD BOY BOOGIE sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace along the inside until deep stretch then weakened. MARK'S BUDDY JACIN had speed through the turn then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Boy Boogie
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace inside, weakened final sixteenth

ENTRY.NAME: Can't Crashmyparty
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, angled out mid stretch, second best, 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Cantrunwithbigdogs
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, chased, rallied 2 wide, late lead, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mark's Buddy Jacin
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Nikao
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, steadied mid stretch, best stride late,

ENTRY.NAME: Council of Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 32000. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50, 000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KETTLE KISS prompted the pace three then two wide, responded under right handed urging to make the lead near the furlong marker and edged clear under confident handling. IN TROUBLED WATERS away alertly, gained a narrow lead inside rivals before a quarter while off the rail in the four path, set a pressured pace into the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. BEAUTIFUL LASS had good early speed four wide, drew closer on the turn three wide, swung wide then weakened. CHILLVILLE had a narrow lead before a quarter while between horses two wide in the five path, checked entering the turn when in tight and dropped out of it.

ENTRY.NAME: In Troubled Waters
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace off rail, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Chillville
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead 2 wide, between rivals, checked 3/8 pole, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Kettle Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4 wide, middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAR MABEE stalked the early pace, rallied three wide through the turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch and drew off through the final furlong to win in hand. CHLOES ANGEL sprinted to the lead along the inside soon after the start, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then was no match for the winner while second best. APPEALING SENORITA hopped at the start, rushed past rivals outside before a quarter to press the pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. SHEZA FINE JUSTICE never far back, failed to respond. LADY ABRIL trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Chloes Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Abril
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, rushed 4w, pressed 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Star Mabee
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, perfect trip, drew off, handily,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 32000. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXCITEMENT chased the leader along the inside into the turn, shifted out past the quarter pole, responded readily when asked with a right handed crop to make the lead two wide inside the furlong marker and drew off under a hand ride. OKLAHOMA JOE broke sharply, set the pace with a clear lead into the stretch then was no match for the winner. SMOOCHER unhurried early, found his best stride late along the rail. MATTHEW'S PATRIOT went evenly. OUR BUCKWHEAT chased the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. ANIMO ROBERTO was no factor. SEASONS END was no threat. LONE BOY was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Excitement
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, angled out 1/4p, rallied 2w,right urging, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Matthew's Patriot
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Seasons End
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Roberto
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, clear lead, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Smoocher
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late rail

ENTRY.NAME: Our Buckwheat
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Snow Racing Stables and Boots N Bikinis LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPTURE MI was hustled from the gate to make the lead shortly after the start, set all the pace and widened at will through the stretch under a strong hand ride to win as much the best. KNIGHTLY MISCHIEF chased the winner near the inside and was no match while clear for second. DRINKSONTHEBEACH chased the winner two wide into the stretch and was outfinished. PRIVATE CONNIE failed to menace. DOMI moved up three wide before a half then came up empty. KRAZY HAWK wide early, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Knightly Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, no match for winner, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Capture Mi
ENTRY.OWNER: Prostar 10 Stables Inc and The Four Horsemen Racing Stable Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set pace, widened at will, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Drinksonthebeach
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Domi
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Private Connie
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Krazy Hawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 32000. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50, 000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEW IT WITH STYLE sprinted to the lead two wide soon after leaving the chute, set all the pace and drew off through deep stretch to win going away while under strong handling. KISS VALENTINA bobbled at the start, rallied three wide through the stretch in the five path and finished second best. KERRI'S MIRACLE chased the winner and was outfinished for second in the three path. FABULOUS CLOWN failed to menace. EXPRESS FASHION had good early speed then faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Kerri's Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, outfinished 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Dew It With Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Express Fashion
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, rallied 3 wide, 5path, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 10 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not C onsidered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWILIGHT VISION away alertly, set a pressured pace into the stretch, shook clear under right handed urging before the furlong marker and just lasted under a strong hand ride. CHAI TEA never far back, rallied three wide through the stretch in the six path and just missed. TYRONA pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. DATTTSAFANCYFOX stalked the pace three wide into the stretch, drifted out to the seven path and lost ground. PURDY PUMKIN was no factor. MS. THE LAW with the second flight along the inside, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. the Law
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Purdy Pumkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Chai Tea
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 3 wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, shook clear, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Tyrona
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Datttsafancyfox
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, drifted wide, lost ground,
